scripts.build: elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=build/build/main.js; uglifyjs build/build/main.js --compress 'pure_funcs=[F2,F3,F4,F5,F6,F7,F8,F9,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9],pure_getters,keep_fargs=false,unsafe_comps,unsafe' | uglifyjs --mangle --output build/build/main.js; cp index.html build/index.html
